com.buralotech.oss.ldapunit

Class TestDirectoryTesterConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.buralotech.oss.ldapunit.TestDirectoryTesterConnection

  • public class TestDirectoryTesterConnection
extends Object
    Unit test that DirectoryTester can connect to a server within the retry count and timeout period if the server start is delayed.
    Since:
    1.0.1
    Author:
    Brian Matthews
